content.html: I was 11 weeks and four days pregnant today, and now I'm not. I have struggled with infertility since I was 16, but I have to keep faith that you aren't my one chance. I love you. I desperately wanted you. You would have been born on our anniversary. I'll miss you forever.
content.value:
I was 11 weeks and four days pregnant today, and now I'm not.

I have struggled with infertility since I was 16, but I have to keep faith that you aren't my one chance.

I love you. I desperately wanted you. You would have been born on our anniversary. I'll miss you forever.
